headline: HII’s Ingalls Shipbuilding Awards $95,700 in STEM Grants
summary: PASCAGOULA, Miss., Feb. 11, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- HII’s (NYSE: HII) Ingalls Shipbuilding division awarded $95,700 in STEM grants to 22 schools and educational organizations across south Mississippi and Alabama during a ceremony at the shipyard Friday. These grants will fund hands-on projects, classroom technology upgrades and STEM-based curricula, encouraging local students to explore careers in fields related to STEM, including shipbuilding and engineering. “Our nation’s future depends on a
